title: Math Book
desc:
Post 385
- Gain the **counting** buff when played.
- **Counting** allows you to play cards with numbers 1 off the current number (Like <:blue:1106234079055200378>3 on <:red:1106234051129507932>4 or <:blue:1106234079055200378>9 on <:red:1106234051129507932>0).
- **Counting** lasts for 3 uses.
